full_summary:
**Announcement |
Tender Notice for Mental Health Training Support**
=====================================================================================

**Reference**

* PW-22-01010001
* A0086/A

**Publication and Closing Dates**
-------------------------------

* Published on: 2022-10-13
* Tender closing date: 2022-11-22 at 13:00:00

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

* A Request for Proposal has been issued for Mental Health Training Support Services.
* The procurement category is SRV (Services).
* The procurement method is Competitive - Selective tendering.
* The requirement is open only to PWGSC Learning Services SA Suppliers.

**Objectives**
--------------

* The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires a consultant to provide expertise in the field of mental health training in support of the Agencys’ Peer Support Program (PSP).
* The contract period will initially be from the date of award to March 31, 2023, with the possibility of two (2) one-year contract extensions.

**Key Point**
-------------

* The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Business Opportunities**
-------------------------

* This procurement has a national scope, targeting businesses in Canada.
* The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is an end-user entity.

**Notice URL**
-------------

* Not applicable

**Attachments**
---------------

* [purchase links to documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/771252ba2a7c0278ca337914fd8e3bad/a0086_nature_of_requirement.pdf) 
* [purchase links to documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/cf9bcb640a53e291b7958c75efaadafb/a0086_nature_of_requirement.pdf)

**Eligible Contractors**
-------------------------

* Canadian businesses are eligible to participate in this procurement.
* The documentation of this announcement is available on the CanadaBuys website.

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* The contracting entity is the Canadian Food Inspection Agency.
* The agency is seeking a consultant to develop mental health training programs in support of their Peer Support Program.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* For more information, please contact: Ronald Staigh, [ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca), 613-737-000
